Sentencas: (La1-c,Sr-c)CoO3 (LSC) solid solutions are promising materials for high temperature electrochemical cells and cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Ab initio study of phase competition in (La1-c,Src)CoO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The Density Functional Theory (DFT) was applied to calculate the energies of the different superstructures in LSC which are stable with respect to formation of anti-phase domains.
Titulo: Ab initio study of phase competition in (La1-c,Src)CoO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The energy parameters determining the relative stability of the cubic superstructures (phases) are extracted from these calculations.
Titulo: Ab initio study of phase competition in (La1-c,Src)CoO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: Using the Concentration Wave formalism and the energy parameters for different phases from DFT calculations, the temperature dependences of the long-range order parameters were obtained characterizing the order-disorder transformations.
Titulo: Ab initio study of phase competition in (La1-c,Src)CoO3 solid solutions
